cooking_method: Cook rice and mutton separately. Fry onions, garlic and chilies. Layer rice and mutton. Top with fried onions. Bake in oven for 30 minutes.
Mix rice flour, salt and water. Make small balls and flatten them. Mix coconut and jaggery. Fill the flattened rice flour dough with the coconut-jaggery mix. Steam for 15 minutes.
Marinate beef with cumin powder, salt and pepper. Fry onions, garlic and chilies. Add beef and cook until tender. Add water if necessary. Serve hot.
